ComicInfo.Title: Two Against Death!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Spirit of Vengeance is joined by the Man Without Fear to save Karen Page from the fatal grasp of Death’s Head! New ground is broken in Johnny and Roxanne’s relationship.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 10:29:58. [CVDB16774]
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Byrne, Gil Kane, John Byrne
ComicInfo.Inker: Don Perlin, John Byrne, Klaus Janson
ComicInfo.Letterer: Denise V. Wohl, Denise Wohl, Irving Watanabe
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gil Kane, Irving Watanabe, Klaus Janson
ComicInfo.Characters: Carson Collier Sr., Daredevil, Death-Stalker, Ghost Rider (Blaze), Heather Glenn, Karen Page, Roxanne Simpson Blaze, Stunt-Master, Zarathos
